availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: J. T. S. Brown (Louisville, Kentucky, grocer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, grocer. Kentucky native. Married to Emily C. Graham Brown in Jefferson County on September 23, 1856. Father of Graham Brown and C. G. Brown.Grocer in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville, Ward 4, p. 78.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994040, Jefferson County Marriages, p. unknown.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007130, Louisville Deaths, p. 55-56.
Find A Grave, "John Thompson Street 'T. S.' Brown, Sr" (1829-1905)," Memorial #94886164, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94886164 (accessed May 4, 2018).
